events.name: Georgia Bulldogs at Alabama Crimson Tide

headlines.description: — Underdog is an unusual role for Alabama.
headlines.shortLinkText: Playoff bound: Bama rolls No. 1 Georgia 41-24 for SEC title

headlines.description: — Michigan ignored the preseason predictions, the early poll snub and especially the critics who thought the program’s best days were long gone.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 2 Michigan takes Big Ten in rout, makes playoff pitch

headlines.description: — Jerome Ford rushed for 187 yards and two touchdowns, Desmond Ridder threw three touchdown passes and No. 3 Cincinnati broke open a close game in the third quarter and rolled past No. 16 Houston 35-20 in the American Athletic Conference championship...
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 3 Cincinnati claims AAC crown, possible playoff spot

video.headline: Jerome Ford hits the jets for a 79-yard TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jerome Ford hits the jets for a 79-yard TD) 2021/12/4 ESHEET

events.name: Baylor Bears at Oklahoma State Cowboys

headlines.description: — Dezmon Jackson came up inches short on a desperate, fourth-down dive in the final seconds for Oklahoma State, knocking the fifth-ranked Cowboys out of contention for a spot in the four-team playoff.
headlines.shortLinkText: Baylor holds on for Big 12 title, knocks Okla St out of CFP

events.name: Pittsburgh Panthers at Wake Forest Demon Deacons

headlines.description: — Kenny Pickett accounted for three touchdowns and Erick Hallett II returned one of Pittsburgh's four interceptions for a touchdown to help the No. 17 Panthers beat No. 18 Wake Forest 45-21 in Saturday night's Atlantic Coast Conference championship game.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 17 Pitt rolls by No. 18 Wake Forest 45-21 for ACC title

events.name: Utah State Aggies at San Diego State Aztecs

headlines.description: — Less than a year after coach Blake Anderson and several players uprooted their lives and moved across the country to team up at Utah State, they triumphantly raised their new school's first Mountain West Conference trophy.
headlines.shortLinkText: Utah St routs No. 19 San Diego St 46-13, wins Mountain West

events.name: Appalachian State Mountaineers at Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns
Kent State Golden Flashes at Northern Illinois Huskies

notes.headline: Rocket Mortgage MAC Football Championship Game

headlines.description: — Quarterback Rocky Lombardi ran for three touchdowns and Jay Ducker ran for 146 yards on 29 carries to power Northern Illinois to a 41-23 victory over Kent State in the Mid-American Conference title game on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: N. Illinois wins MAC championship 41-23 over Kent St.

events.name: SE Louisiana Lions at James Madison Dukes
USC Trojans at California Golden Bears

headlines.description: — Trey Paster scored on a 55-yard fumble return in the second quarter, California’s defense made a clutch stop near the goal line, and the Golden Bears held off Southern California 24-14 in the season finale for both teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cal's defense rises up, hands USC fourth straight loss
